name: Hospes Palau de la Mar Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hospes Palau came highly recommended by an unnamed high end travel site, and I'm delighted I took their advice. The rooms were spacious and beautifully decorated with modern furnishings.
reviews.title: Surprise boutique hotel in ideal spot in Valencia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Though small, the HP has a wonderful garden area (perfect for an afternoon tea or drink), a small and intimate bar, a cute restaurant, and ample lobby seating.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for Valencia stay

reviews.text: Best yet, the HP is a short walk from the old quarter of Valencia, and is located in a more modern area of Valencia, where you can either walk to the best sights, or take a convenient bus to wherever you wish. The bus stop is simply down the street from the hotel.
reviews.title: Amazing stay, incredible city

reviews.text: Though we didn't dine in their restaurant (we preferred to sample the local Paella, Valencia's specialty), we did enjoy an excellent breakfast spread each morning.
reviews.title: Fine hotel close to the City Center

reviews.text: The location was close enough to allow us to come and go into the old quarter at our convenience, and we enjoyed going there both to do sight seeing as well as enjoy some local cafes.
reviews.title: A Laid-Back,Yet Luxe, Boutique Valenician Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly staff, chic decor, comfy beds, good pillows and sheets, well-designed, well-located. I thought I had booked a king-size bed for me and my (same-sex) partner, but my request didn't show up on our reservation. We were initially taken to a room with two twin beds. This happens to us all the time since hotel staff often make the assumption that two men traveling together are "just friends." But when we asked for a king bed instead, staff quickly and graciously moved us to a different room, which turned out to be bigger and nicer overall. Fantastic, large bathroom with open shower, double sink, and a skylight.
reviews.title: Nice, modern, stylish, friendly, welcoming.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My only complaint was that the (free!) WiFi was a little spotty.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel in Valencia! Well situated!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently stayed one night at this hotel and we thoroughly enjoyed it. The staff is friendly and very helpful. It is situated just a few minutes walk from the perimeter of the old town and about a 30-minute walk from La Ciudad de Las Artes y Las Ciencias, in a quiet neighbourhood for those who enjoy peaceful nights. It had a wonderful (big!) jacuzzi and a sauna. It also has a spa but we did not try the services. I have no problems in suggesting this place to my friends.
reviews.title: Great relaxing hotel close to everything

reviews.text: Stayed for Grand Prix weekend as did most of Red Bull Team. Not often you bump into Racing driver over breakfast. Speaking of which the range and quality of the food is excellent. Best breakfast anywhere we have ever been. Restaurant meals also up there with the best. Our superior room was freest size with doors opening onto large tub. No views as such since fence doors opened onto roof of spa below but nice sunken garden restaurant and lovely air-conditioned bar. Small pool with jacuzzi and steam room which we had all to ourselves and a small gym that we were far too chilled to use! Room service prompt and well stocked mini-bar with red and white wine and champagne. Staff extremely helpful with iced juice on arrival. Taxis arrived in a minute although most places very walkable. Had super time and would go again like a shot. Not sure about rooms in annex as very overlooked by garden restaurant but we were in the main building so no problem for us.
reviews.title: Excellent service and food, good location, nice atmosphere

reviews.text: We stayed at the Palau de la Mar for 2 days and it was a very pleasant experience. We would definitely recommend this hotel for its friendly service staff, excellent food and location. The accomodations were simple and elegant . Our room faced the garden which was really nice. Just keep in mind that nothing is open on Sundays, including the hotel restaraunt but the "light menu" from the bar is available during certain times of the day and is excellent! We sat in the garden with friends and shared several plates. You can get around the city by walking most places. The staff is happy to help you find whatever you are looking for. We booked right from their website and recieved a good deal...$116 eu per night. Defintely good value for the experience at this hotel.
reviews.title: Hospes Palau de la Mar, Valencia - Great Hotel in Good Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a great hotel, this is the 2nd time we have stayed at a Hospes hotel, staying at the Amerigo in Alicante 2 years ago. We were greeted as soon as we pulled up at the hotel, and the welcome and service continued until we left extremely refreshed and rested.
reviews.title: Excellence as standard

reviews.text: We had booked for one night and arrived a day late (our mistake) this was not a problem and we were shown to our room which was roomy and very comfortable, breakfast was very good and we really enjoyed our stay and look forward to our next stay with Hospes in Seville next year!
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great place to stay..best staff I have ever known, so helpful and friendly...rooms are great, bed was great, the whole place is quality.
reviews.title: Top marks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One minor complaint...the hot water took a while to reach the shower/wash basin, but it was no big deal.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for a citytrip to Valencia

reviews.text: This place has it all - location, style, nice rooms, excellent service, good restaurant. We had a slight glitch at check-in which I won't go into, since they couldn't have been more helpful in resolving matters and making us feel welcome.
reviews.title: Beautiful, clean and convenient location!
